articles.author: Vivien Lou Chen
articles.title: Why trouble for the biggest foreign buyer of U.S. debt could ripple through America’s bond market - MarketWatch
articles.description: Developments in Japan are creating a risk that investors in the U.S. Treasury market may one day pull the rug out by keeping more of their savings at home
articles.content: Recent developments overseas have the potential to complicate the White Houses agenda to bring down borrowing costs, while heightening competition for investors in the U.S. and Japanese bond markets.… [+458 chars]

articles.title: Paul vs Joshua: Briton says YouTuber is 'serious fighter' but he wants to 'break' him - BBC
articles.description: Briton Anthony Joshua says he will "stomp all over" Jake Paul and "break" the American as the pair come face-to-face to promote their heavyweight fight.
articles.content:
Briton Anthony Joshua said he will "stomp all over" Jake Paul and "break" the American as the pair came face-to-face to promote next month's heavyweight fight.
